::Koj::
Koj's Chains wrap around Firearm's neck, arms, waist, leg, and bleeding 
stump. "I should lets his ass fry." Koj reroutes his power both of his 
shoulder plates open "Tekno Power Stream"  As the Twin Fusion Cannons Fire a 
steady stream hitting the ground giving Koj a nice amount of extra thrust. 
Koj fires off his Jets at max burn. With a steady jerk he rips Firearm off 
shields. Koj Chains start reeling in a extremely fast rate pulling Firearm 
towards Koj. "I don't get paid enough for this."
